snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg, a billionaire with a long-term interest in public health, said he would give Planned Parenthood Federation of America a $250,000 matching gift.
abstract: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg, a billionaire with a long-term interest in public health, said he would give Planned Parenthood Federation of America a $250,000 matching gift.

byline.original: By MICHAEL PAULSON and KATE TAYLOR

headline.main: Mayor to Give $250,000 to Planned Parenthood
